articles.author: Greg Iacurci
articles.title: A debt ceiling standoff may trigger 'serious' fallout for Americans, warns economist. Here's what it means for you - CNBC
articles.description: The U.S. will likely hit its $31.4 trillion debt ceiling Thursday. A default could follow, would have far-reaching negative impacts for consumers and investors.
articles.content:
U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Jan. 10, 2023 in Washington.
The U.S. may be about to hit its debt ceiling.
Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said last week that the U.S. would likely hit the… [+6098 chars]

articles.title: Defending champion Nadal knocked out of Australian Open - News24
articles.description: Defending champion and top seed Rafael Nadal crashed out of the Australian Open in round two to 65th-ranked American Mackenzie McDonald in a major upset.
articles.content:
Defending champion Rafael Nadal crashed out of the Australian Open in round two to 65th-ranked American Mackenzie McDonald in a major upset on Wednesday, his worst Grand Slam result in seven years.
